I'm a first-year PhD student at EPFL in the LTS2 lab. I work on mathematical and physical aspects of diffusion processes. In particular, I try to consolidate theoretical aspects with Differential Geometry, Field Theories and High-Dimensional Statistics.


## Education

- 2025-present: PhD Student, LTS2 Laboratory, EPFL
- 2022-2025: Master's in Electrical Engineering, ETH Zürich
- 2018-2022: Bachelor's in Communication Systems, EPFL
